mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TRAINERCONSULTATION WHERE userId=#{userId} AND TRAINERNO =#{trainerId}

SELECT u.NAME AS "userName", tc.STATUS AS "status", tc.ISPAID AS "isPaid", tc.USERID AS "userId", tc.CONSULTID AS "consultId"
FROM TRAINERCONSULTATION tc JOIN TRAINERS t ON tc.TRAINERNO = t.TRAINERNO JOIN USERS u ON tc.USERID = u.ID WHERE t.TRAINERNO = #{trainerNo}

SELECT u.NAME AS "trainerName", t.WORKPLACENAME AS "workPlaceName", t.LOCATION AS "location", tc.STATUS AS "status", tc.ISPAID AS "isPaid", tc.TRAINERNO AS "trainerNo", tc.CONSULTID AS "consultId"
FROM TRAINERCONSULTATION tc JOIN TRAINERS t ON tc.TRAINERNO = t.TRAINERNO JOIN USERS u ON t.USERID = u.ID WHERE tc.USERID = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TRAINERCONSULTATION WHERE USERID=#{userId} AND TRAINERNO=#{trainerNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TRAINERCONSULTATION SET STATUS='APPROVED' WHERE TRAINERNO=#{trainerNo} AND USERID=#{userId}
UPDATE TRAINERCONSULTATION SET STATUS='REJECTED' WHERE TRAINERNO=#{trainerNo} AND USERID=#{userId}
